scripts.deploy: docker compose build && docker push asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/wefly-407313/container-registry/track_loader:1.0 && docker push asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/wefly-407313/container-registry/wefly-client:1.0 && docker push asia-northeast1-docker.pkg.dev/wefly-407313/container-registry/wefly-api-server:1.0
scripts.test-all: npm run test-client && npm run test-api-server && npm run test-track-loader && npm run test-common
